title: A proper counter to vayne.
body: I've just realized that the perfect counter to vayne already exists, and her name is quinn. think about it, quinn has a way to stop all of vayne's damage, and she has got pretty much an opposite curve of power, starting off with a monster early game and mid game, falling off late. the only problem is that people don't play quinn, and they think she is bad. but considering how hard you people complain about vayne, you should really consider this. however, quinn isn't an easy champion to play, you have to get good with her first, but she seems to be a perfect counter.

replies.body: Quinn just isn't that good she has high burst not much sustained damage but that is not what you want from an adc, draven is a much better vayne counter.
quinn has a blind though, which means vayne no longer has damage.
The perfect counter to Vayne is Kalista. If you pair kalista with annie / thresh / janna then there's NOTHING  a vayne player can do early if you play it correctly.
